demolition.translation[0].definitions[0]: the complete destruction of a building
Consent is required for the demolition of any building.
Demolition work has already begun at the site.
demolition.translation[0].definitions[1]: 50,000 fans watched the 7-0 demolition of Dynamo Kiev.
demolition.translation[0].definitions[2]: a process in which something is ended or ruined completely
The policies are intended to halt the demolition of the rural economy.
demolition.translation[0].definitions[3]: the act of proving that an idea, opinion etc is wrong
This is a legend that deserves demolition.
